cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare

类 ShareCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare.ShareCore

  • public class ShareCore
extends java.lang.Object
    ShareCore the actual export of OnekeyShare, which reflects the pass in HashMap to a Platform.ShareParams of the target platform, and shares it
